CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PzNDTDTBT showed a sharp diffraction peak at 2θ = 21.4 ° and two weak peaks at 23.8 ° and 26.6 ° for the as-prepared thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |

In the given paragraph, the material name is "PzNDTDTBT". It is mentioned at the beginning of the paragraph and is the subject of the sentence. The rest of the paragraph discusses the diffraction peaks of this material, but the material itself is only mentioned once.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |

In the given paragraph, the only clear material name is "PzNDTDTBT". The other terms in the paragraph, such as "the as-prepared thin film" and "2θ = 21.4 °, 23.8 °, and 26.6 °" do not refer to specific materials, but rather to the experimental conditions and results for the PzNDTDTBT material.
